subject: Re: Testing Private Methods
msgSnippet: ... Oh, it s already written.  It s being tech reviewed at the moment. I just need to extract it and make it more freestanding. Dave
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Mike Colbert <mbcolbert@y...>"
<mbcolbert@y...> wrote:
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Dave Astels <dave@s...>" <dave@s...>
> wrote:

> > I have a section in the JUnit chapter in my TDD book on the topic.
> > I'm thinking maybe it should be the next Coad Letter issue.
> >
> > I'll try to do justice to the topic once I'm back at the hotel and
> > post the first draft of the results here.
> >
> > Dave
>
>
> Okay then. Is it okay if the rest of us continue the thread here in
> the meantime? Or would you prefer we put it on hold until you can
> get the book written?

Oh, it's already written. It's being tech reviewed at the moment.

I just need to extract it and make it more freestanding.

Dave
